entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Muskoka
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:26 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 02:51 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 2.7°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 mm. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
